commit.message:
dYdX Rewards adapter (#908)

* feat: dydx rewards

* fix(dydx-rewards): update callback function and contract

* fix(dydx-rewards): change BN library and add tests

* refactor(dydx-rewards): refactor, cleanup, tests

* fix(dydx-rewards): small changes

* fix(dydx-rewards): change callback param order

* docs(dydx-rewards): clarify the need for IPFS env vars

* fix(dydx-rewards): convert input to BigNumber immediately to avoid possible conversion issues

* feat(dydx-rewards): add support for retroactive rewards

* fix(dydx-rewards): account for CBOR encoding issues

* fix(dydx-rewards): handle expo users with no retroactive volume

* fix(dydx-rewards): fix calculation and rounding issues, and update tests

* refactor(dydx-rewards): updates, tests, refactor

* test(ipfs): add tests

* refactor(dydx-rewards): update schema/env var documentation

* fix(dydx-rewards): fix JSON imports in tests

* fix(dydx-rewards): fix flakey test

* style(dydx-rewards): reformat

* Use referenced types where possible (#921)

Co-authored-by: HenryNguyen5 <6404866+HenryNguyen5@users.noreply.github.com>
